name: rankbeacon-seo-exorcist
description: AI-powered SEO monitoring platform with supernatural twist - Kiroween Hackathon Entry

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mcp"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:mcp
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../mcp-server && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:mcp
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:mcp

author: RankBeacon Team
